pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. Each image generation costs 1 credit, video generation costs 10 credits, high resolution and no watermarks.

onetime.name: One-time
onetime.description: Pay once for a pack of credits

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: One credit allows you to generate one image, ten credits allow you to generate one video, in high resolution without watermarks. You can use credits for any supported image size up to 5000x5000 pixels.
faq.answer2: For subscription plans, unused credits roll over up to five times your monthly allocation. Credits remain valid as long as your subscription is active. For one-time purchases, credits are valid for 2 years.
faq.question3: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer3: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your benefits will continue until the end of your billing period.
faq.question4: Is there a limit to how many photos I can colorize?
faq.answer4: The free plan allows unlimited colorizations with watermarks. For high-resolution, watermark-free images, you're limited by the number of credits in your plan.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.dataCollection: We only collect information you provide when registering, using AI image/video processing services, or making payments.
privacy.personalInfo1: Registration information: email, username, password, etc.
privacy.personalInfo2: Payment information: credit card details, billing address, etc.
privacy.personalInfo3: Usage data: uploaded images/videos, processing records, etc.
privacy.personalInfo4: Device information: IP address, browser type, operating system, etc.
privacy.usageData2: Error logs and technical support information
privacy.dataUsage: Your information is used for account management, service improvement, order processing, and legal requirements.
privacy.serviceProvision: Process your AI image/video generation requests and provide technical support
privacy.improvement: Analyze usage patterns to optimize AI algorithms and service quality
privacy.communication: Send service notifications, updates, and marketing information
privacy.legal: Comply with laws and regulations, handle disputes and complaints
privacy.dataProtection: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data and do not sell your information to third parties.
privacy.securityMeasures1: Data encryption for transmission and storage
privacy.securityMeasures3: Regular security audits and vulnerability fixes
privacy.securityMeasures4: Employee confidentiality training and data protection agreements
privacy.dataRetention: We only retain your data for as long as necessary to provide services, up to a maximum of 3 years.
privacy.thirdParty: We may use third-party service providers to support our service operations.
privacy.aiServices: We partner with AI service providers like Alibaba Cloud and Tencent Cloud. Your data may be processed through these platforms.
privacy.paymentServices: We use payment services like Stripe and Alipay to process your payment information.
privacy.userRights: According to relevant laws and regulations, you have the following rights:
privacy.access: You have the right to know how we collect and use your personal information
privacy.correction: You have the right to request us to correct or supplement your personal information
privacy.deletion: You have the right to request us to delete your personal information
privacy.portability: You have the right to obtain a copy of your personal information
privacy.contact: For privacy-related questions, please contact us through the following methods:
privacy.companyAddress: Room 1001, Building A, Innovation Plaza, Technology Park, Chaoyang District, Beijing

contact.contactDescription: If you encounter any problems during use, please contact us via email or phone, and we will resolve them for you as soon as possible!

about.title: About SmartPhoto
about.subtitle: SmartPhoto is an AI-powered platform for image editing and animation, designed to help you bring your photos to life with state-of-the-art technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At SmartPhoto, we're on a mission to democratize advanced image editing technology. We believe that everyone should have access to powerful AI tools that can transform their photos and preserve memories in new and exciting ways. By combining cutting-edge research with intuitive design, we're making professional-grade image enhancement accessible to all.

aiColorization.title: AI Image Colorization
aiColorization.description: Transform black and white photos into vibrant, realistic colorized images using our advanced AI technology.

smartEditing.title: Smart Editing
smartEditing.description: Edit and enhance your images with AI-powered tools for removing watermarks, expanding images, and more.

videoAnimation.title: Video Animation
videoAnimation.description: Bring your still images to life with facial animation and lip-sync technology.

emojiEffects.title: Emoji Effects
emojiEffects.description: Create fun emoji animations from your portraits with our specialized AI technology.

alex.name: Alex Thompson
alex.bio: Computer vision expert with 10+ years of experience in AI and machine learning.

sophia.name: Sophia Chen
sophia.bio: PhD in Computer Science, specialized in deep learning and neural networks.

marcus.name: Marcus Johnson
marcus.bio: Former research scientist at OpenAI with expertise in generative models.

emma.name: Emma Rodriguez
emma.bio: Passionate about creating intuitive user experiences for advanced technology.

colorization.question: How does the AI colorization work?
colorization.answer: Our AI uses deep learning algorithms trained on millions of color images to intelligently analyze black and white photos and predict realistic colors. It recognizes objects, lighting conditions, and contextual information to apply appropriate colors to different parts of the image.

formats.question: What image formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support JPG, PNG, and WEBP formats. Images should be less than 10MB in size for optimal processing.

credits.question: How many credits do I need for different features?
credits.answer: Image colorization requires 6 credits per image. Video animations require 12-15 credits depending on the complexity. You can check the exact credit costs on our pricing page.

refund.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
refund.answer: If you're not satisfied with the results, please contact our support team. We offer refunds for failed generations, and our team will review other requests on a case-by-case basis.

privacy.question: How is my data handled?
privacy.answer: We prioritize your privacy. Your images are processed securely and not used for training our AI without explicit consent. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

getInTouch.title: Get In Touch
getInTouch.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Our team is always ready to assist with any inquiries about our services.

businessHours.title: Business Hours
businessHours.supportNote: Support tickets are monitored 24/7, and our team will respond as soon as possible, even outside business hours.

cta.title: Ready to transform your photos?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied users who are already bringing their photos to life with SmartPhoto.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to LivePhoto. Please read the following terms carefully. By using this platform, you agree to these terms.
terms.acceptance: By registering an account or using our services, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to comply with these terms of service.
terms.ageRequirement: You must be at least 18 years old or have full legal capacity in your jurisdiction to use our services.
terms.serviceDescription: LivePhoto provides AI-powered image and video processing services, including but not limited to:
terms.aiImage: Generate, edit, and enhance images using advanced AI technology
terms.aiVideo: Create emoji videos, lip-sync videos, and other AI-driven video content
terms.colorization: Add natural, realistic colors to black and white images
terms.tts: Convert text to natural, fluent speech content
terms.userObligations: You must ensure that uploaded images/videos are legal, do not infringe others' rights, and are not used for illegal purposes.
terms.contentRequirements1: Uploaded content must be original or you must have legal rights to use it
terms.contentRequirements2: Do not upload content containing violence, pornography, discrimination, or other illegal or inappropriate material
terms.contentRequirements3: Do not infringe on others' intellectual property, portrait rights, or other legal rights
terms.contentRequirements4: Do not use for fraud, harassment, or other illegal activities
terms.accountSecurity1: Keep your account information and login credentials secure
terms.accountSecurity2: Do not lend your account to others or engage in account trading
terms.accountSecurity3: Contact us immediately if you notice any account anomalies
terms.serviceUsage: This platform is for lawful personal/commercial use only. AI-generated content is for reference only; the platform is not responsible for its accuracy.
terms.personalUse: Can be used for personal creation, learning, entertainment, and other non-commercial purposes
terms.commercialUse: Can be used for commercial projects, but must comply with relevant laws and regulations
terms.prohibitedUse: Do not use for creating false information, deepfakes, or other illegal purposes
terms.aiAccuracy: AI-generated content may contain inaccuracies. Please use with caution and verify independently
terms.payment: We use a credit-based pricing model. Users need to purchase credits to use our services.
terms.creditSystem: Different services consume different amounts of credits. Credits are non-refundable after purchase
terms.refundPolicy: Except for legally required circumstances, purchased credits are non-refundable
terms.subscription: We offer monthly subscription services with more credits and benefits
terms.priceChanges: We reserve the right to adjust service prices and will notify users in advance of changes
terms.intellectualProperty: Information about content ownership and platform rights.
terms.userContent: You retain ownership of uploaded content but grant us license to process and use this content
terms.platformRights: We own the intellectual property rights to platform technology, algorithms, and services
terms.limitation: The platform is not liable for service interruptions or data loss caused by force majeure or third parties.
terms.serviceInterruption: Service interruptions due to system maintenance, technical failures, or other reasons
terms.dataLoss: Data loss or corruption due to technical failures, hacking attacks, or other reasons
terms.thirdParty: Service issues caused by third-party service provider problems
terms.termination: Terms regarding account and service termination.
terms.userTermination: You may stop using our services and delete your account at any time
terms.platformTermination: We may terminate your account for terms violations or other reasons
terms.contact: For questions about these terms, please contact us through the following methods:
terms.companyAddress: Room 1001, Building A, Innovation Plaza, Technology Park, Chaoyang District, Beijing

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.subtitle: We are committed to providing you with a satisfactory service experience. Below are the details of our refund policy.

overview.title: Policy Overview
overview.description: We understand that you may be dissatisfied with the purchased service, so we have established a reasonable refund policy. Under specific conditions, we provide refund services to ensure your rights.

eligible.title: Eligible for Refund
eligible.description: You can apply for a refund within 7 days of purchase, provided that the credits have not been used.

unused.title: Unused Credits
unused.description: Purchased credits must be completely unused. Used credits are non-refundable.

technical.title: Technical Issues
technical.description: If our technical failures prevent normal service use, you can apply for a full refund.

usedCredits.title: Used Credits
usedCredits.description: Used credits are non-refundable, including credits consumed for image generation, video production, and other services.

subscription.title: Subscription Services
subscription.description: Monthly subscription services are non-refundable during the subscription period, but you can cancel auto-renewal.

promotional.title: Promotional Activities
promotional.description: Credits obtained through promotional activities or services purchased at promotional prices are generally non-refundable.

violation.title: Terms of Service Violation
violation.description: If users violate our terms of service or usage policies, refunds will not be provided.

step1.title: Submit Application
step1.description: Contact us via email, explaining the refund reason and order information.

step2.title: Review and Confirm
step2.description: We will review your refund application within 24 hours to confirm if it meets refund conditions.

step3.title: Process Refund
step3.description: After approval, we will process the refund within 3-5 business days.

step4.title: Refund Received
step4.description: The refund will be returned to your original payment account. The actual arrival time depends on the payment platform.

email.title: Email Contact
email.description: To apply for a refund, please send an email to the following address:

response.title: Response Time
response.description: We commit to responding to your refund application within 24 hours and completing the refund process within 3-5 business days.
